Google Executive Chairman Eric Schmidt is showing off his lighter side...
While visiting Seoul, Schmidt got a dance lesson from South Korean pop star Psy,...
...the man behind "Gangnam Style" song and the dance craze.
The two also talked about viral videos and how YouTube can help the music industry.
You may recall that Google's YouTube helped make the song an international hit.
The official video has received nearly 300 million views in just over two months.
No word on how many hits that video of Eric Schmidt has gotten.
